targets.query: from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "signalr" and r._field == "latency")
from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt" and r._field == "messages")
from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http" and r._field == "errors") |> last()
